title: Week 3 Preview From Boone
description:
Jen Lada, Desmond Howard and David Pollack discuss quarterback problems at Texas. Plus, did Michigan and Penn State make the right moves with their starting quarterbacks? Plus, the crew takes a trip down memory lane on some huge upsets thanks to Appalachian State.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew previews the biggest games of the weekend from Boone
